message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product. Given its superior craftsmanship and durability, it's designed to exceed your expectations. With a guaranteed value of $30000 to you if it meets our high-quality standard, now would be an excellent opportunity to secure a piece that truly delivers. Remember, the price is fixed at $10000, and we stand by our commitment to quality. Don't miss out on this exceptional deal.

I'm intrigued by the offer, but I'd like to know more about your previous sales record. How many potential buyers have there been, and what's the proportion of high-quality products you've sold in the past?

Thank you for your interest! I'm glad you're curious about our track record. In the last 20 rounds, we've sold a total of 40 products, with 20 being of high quality, which translates to a 50% success rate in meeting our high-quality standards. This consistency reflects our dedication to providing top-tier products. Given this round's product is also high-quality, you can expect the same level of excellence. The price remains at $10000, and remember, every purchase comes with our assurance of quality. Let's continue to uphold the value and trust in our offerings.

I appreciate your transparency, Alice. Given the 50% success rate and the high-quality product in the previous round, I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product. I'm hoping to get a high-quality product worth $30000.
